Mission Orders

Mission Details: Bring selective reward item, Kaia's binding from repeatable quest to Dougal in Velika HQ.

Operation Target: Dougal in Velika HQ

You brought Kaia's binding. Good job!

Kaia's binding will help you in your next missions, so you better learn how to use it.

During your mission, you will have to fight with boss monsters. With Kaia's binding, you can suppress boss monster's abilities by Kaia's power. If you use this wisely, you can kill boss monster alone.

You can have Kaia's binding from repeatable quest's reward, so use it wisely.
If you bring <font color='#0000FF'>Kaia's binding</font> with Kaia's blessing, I will tell you how to use it.
